meanings.definition: Not able to be broken or damaged.
meanings.sent1: The diamond was unbreakable, it could not be scratched.
meanings.sent2: The unbreakable glass did not shatter when it fell.
meanings.sent3: The unbreakable toy soldier always won the battle.
meanings.sent4: Her unbreakable spirit carried her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The unbreakable bond between the siblings was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: Strong and durable, not easily broken.
meanings.sent1: The unbreakable rope held the swing securely in place.
meanings.sent2: The unbreakable metal frame of the chair ensured its longevity.
meanings.sent3: The unbreakable tree stood tall against the storm.
meanings.sent4: Their unbreakable friendship was tested but never faltered.
meanings.sent5: The unbreakable lock kept their secrets safe.
